name: Tian
description:
Tian is a third person exploration game with puzzle elements.

The game requires an Xbox360 controller as well as a webcam with microphone, preferrably external for practicality (but internal does work).
Current state of development: vertical slice prototype

A full version of the game would contain several indoor puzzle areas, maybe even several planets.

The game is meant to surprise.
So we advise against watching our demo video.
But nevertheless, here it is:
www.youtube.com/watch?v=cBhUZAVvomc

Programming: Mohamed Fawzy (www.mohfawzy.com)
Art Direction, Assets: Lutz Kleinau (www.lutz-kleinau.com)
